PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Survivability and Cascade Resilience of National Knowledge Network
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
-Implemented an algorithm to estimate the survivability and cascade resilience of infrastructure networks modeled as graph in C.
-Estimated the survivability and cascade resilience of the backbone of National Knowledge Network of India with the aforementioned algorithm.
-Worked on survivable network topology design for the backbone of NKN.
-Worked on developing routing algorithm which will improve the survivability of optical backbone networks.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Characterization and Comparison of Local Community Detection Algorithms
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
- Developed an algorithm characterization of Local Community Detection Algorithms (LCDAs) for graphs, e.g., social networks
- Contributed my implementations of these algorithms to The Graffy Project, a graph library under development at Supercomputer Education and Research Centre, IISc (to be eventually released on SourceForge)
- Conducted an accuracy comparison of various LCDAs which led to an understanding of their relative effectiveness
- Designed a new algorithm for the problem which outperforms previous ones on various real-world and synthetic graphs
